features.featureTitle: Implement an API Configuration modal dialog that allows admins to set the external AI API endpoint URL and API key. The dialog must include: a semi-transparent black modal overlay; a centered white dialog box with rounded corners (~500px wide); a bold 'API Configuration' title; a labeled text input for 'API Endpoint URL'; a labeled password input for 'API Key' with character masking; a 'Cancel' button with a gray outline style; and a 'Save' button with a solid blue style. The dialog should display inline validation errors for missing/invalid fields and show a loading state while saving.
